scripts.deployStack: sam build; sam deploy --stack-name $STACK_NAME --s3-bucket restauranto-artifacts --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --profile restauranto-deploy; npm run postDeployStack
scripts.deployDev: export STACK_NAME=restauranto-dev; npm run prepare:dev; npm run deployStack
scripts.deployStaging: export STACK_NAME=restauranto-staging; npm run prepare:staging; npm run deployStack
scripts.deployProd: export STACK_NAME=restauranto-prod; npm run prepare:prod; npm run deployStack
scripts.deployProdCICD: export STACK_NAME=restauranto-prod; sam build; sam deploy --stack-name $STACK_NAME --s3-bucket restauranto-artifacts --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
